name: Scribble (itch) (Die Happy Games)
description: Scribble is short, relaxing game about exploring creative and self-reflective writing prompts designed to inspire. Set in a cozy bedroom with a beautiful forest environment, accompanied by music from Lofi Girl on top of carefully tuned ambience. Each writing prompt has objectives to help you think outside of the box. Your journal entries are scored on a per-letter scoring system similar to Scrabble. There are also 10 hidden collectible letters!
